description: This header file defines interfaces for the Message Bus initialization, finalization, and resource management in a software component related to an EPON agent. It includes function declarations for engaging the message bus, initializing and finalizing the system, performing bus checks, and freeing resources.

methods.name: ssp_Mbi_MessageBusEngage
methods.description: Engages the message bus for a specified component using provided configuration and path.

methods.name: ssp_Mbi_Initialize
methods.description: Initializes the EPON agent component with user data.

methods.name: ssp_Mbi_Finalize
methods.description: Finalizes or cleans up the EPON agent component using user data.

methods.name: ssp_Mbi_Buscheck
methods.description: Performs a check on the message bus system.

methods.name: ssp_Mbi_FreeResources
methods.description: Frees resources with given priority and user data.
